catalysts.thesis: Tesla stock is under pressure (down 3.3% on Dec 30) as investors nervously await Q4 delivery numbers. Analysts expect ~515k deliveries to meet the 1.8M annual target; a miss could trigger a further breakdown.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 Delivery Numbers expected on January 2, 2025. Consensus estimate: 511,000-515,000 vehicles.
catalysts.prediction_market: Kalshi: 'Tesla deliveries Q4 > 480k' is 70% Yes. Polymarket: 'Tesla Q4 Deliveries' volume rising.
catalysts.recency_proof: Investopedia (Dec 30, 2024): 'Tesla Leads Big-Tech Slump... deliveries report due Thursday.'
catalysts.risk: Stronger-than-expected China numbers (record registrations) could cause a squeeze.

catalysts.thesis: Boeing shares dropped >2% breaking technical support at $170 after a 737-800 crash in South Korea prompted immediate inspection orders, reigniting safety concerns.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Jeju Air 737-800 crash incident (Dec 29/30) and subsequent South Korean government inspection order.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket: 'Boeing at fault for South Korea crash?' market created Dec 30. Sentiment implies regulatory risk.
catalysts.recency_proof: MoneyMorning (Dec 30, 2024): 'Boeing Shares Hit Key Technical Support... after 737-800 crash in South Korea.'
catalysts.risk: Investigation clears Boeing of mechanical fault (e.g., pilot error).

catalysts.thesis: Yields hit multi-month highs (10Y > 4.6%) as traders price out a January Fed rate cut, creating a headwind for equities at all-time highs.
catalysts.catalyst_details: FOMC Meeting Jan 29, 2025. Market has repriced January cut probability significantly lower in the last 72h.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket: 'Fed Rate Cut Jan 2025' odds collapsed to ~13-15%. Kalshi: 'Cut 25bps' at 15%.
catalysts.recency_proof: CoinGape (Dec 29, 2024): 'January Fed Rate Cut Odds Fall to New Lows (13%) After Strong GDP Data.'
catalysts.risk: Weak labor data in early January forces Fed pivot back to dovishness.

catalysts.thesis: Prosus N.V. has agreed to acquire Despegar.com for $1.7 billion ($19.50/share), representing a significant premium and consolidation in the Latin American travel sector.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Acquisition announced during the week of Dec 23-29, 2024. Deal pending closing conditions.
catalysts.prediction_market: Implied probability high based on definitive agreement; arb spreads likely tight.
catalysts.recency_proof: IMAA Institute (Dec 31, 2024 report covering Dec 23-29): 'Prosus N.V. to Acquire Despegar.com for USD 1.70 Billion.'
catalysts.risk: Regulatory hurdles in Latin American jurisdictions could delay or block the deal.

catalysts.thesis: MicroStrategy plunged 8.2% as Bitcoin failed to reclaim $100k by year-end, leading to book-squaring and volatility in crypto-proxy stocks.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Year-end portfolio rebalancing and Bitcoin failing to hit the psychological $100k milestone in 2024.
catalysts.prediction_market: Polymarket: 'Bitcoin hit $100k in 2024?' odds collapsed to <1% as time expires.
catalysts.risk: Sudden spot Bitcoin ETF inflows in first week of Jan 2025.
